title: Just like Chicago weather, Cubs being blown away by Mets in every way
text: Just like Chicago weather, Cubs being blown away by Mets in every way Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Mets blowing Cubs away as hard as Chicago winds in taking 3-0 NLCS lead behind power pitching, poor Cubs defense, and one red-hot hitter New York Mets V Chicago Cubs: Which Lovable Loser to Root For? 01:00 The National League Championship Series is set: the Chicago Cubs v the Chicago Cubs of New York. The Lovable Losers agains the Losers Who Are Lovable This Year. Both the Cubs and the Mets enter the NLCS on a wave of momentum, overcoming opponents previous editions of themselves would have been... You Might Like Other recent news in Sports
